Intuitive Services Designed for Your Growth

From expert Tarot readings to Astrology insights and empowering Hypnotherapy sessions, Tonyana provides personalized services crafted to illuminate your path, strengthen your intuition, and foster lasting personal transformation.

Hypnosis Session

I am certified in Hypnosis and also am accredited through the International Board of Coaches and Practitioners! If you would like to delve into the depths of your mind as a 17 year Professional Intuitive, consider hiring me for a Hypnosis Session.

1 hour $140 per hour
Death Doula

Providing non-medical holistic support for individuals at the end of their life and respite for the caregivers who love them. I focus on holding space spiritually and keep individuals supported to their dignity. We plan for the final days together, advocate for personal wishes to be carried through, make legacy pieces, or simply just spend time together watching game shows.

Planning or short visits $30 per hour
Extra for any type of projects requiring supplies, etc.

*By law, I have to state that my services are for entertainment purposes only and I am in no way a doctor, lawyer, or financial advisor. If you have a pre-existing mental health condition or are experiencing symptoms of mental illness I urge you not to work with me (or any reader) without the supervision of your mental health professional. Your decisions are yours alone.
